title: Laathi nach
text: Laathi nach is a cultural dance of the <a href="Tharu%20people">Tharu people</a>, and is also known as the Tharu stick dance. This dance has been performed mainly near about <a href="Dashain">Dashain</a>, which is similar to <a href="Dandiya%20Raas">Dandiya Raas</a>, but this is a bit different in performance. In this ritual dance all <a href="dancers">dancers</a> should be male or female only, as they must wake up holy sprite goddess <a href="Durga">Durga</a>.
